title: Founders Unfiltered Podcast
blurb: Unscripted conversations on building a company
description: In each episode, the hosts talk to an entrepreneur about their story. From the ups and downs to start-up to how they came up with the idea to advice for aspiring entrepreneurs- an authentic depiction of the challenges of start-up life. Released every 2 weeks.

title: Banned Instagram Hashtag Checker
blurb: Never worry about using banned hashtags on Instagram again.
description: Instagram is always banning/un-banning hashtags based on recent content and activity, which means it's near impossible to avoid them slipping into your posts - our banned hashtag checker allows you to check a hashtag's using Instagram's official API.

title: Postkit
blurb: Programmatic image generation for social media
description: Postkit allows you to build image templates using CSS, then generate new images from these templates through dynamically generated forms, URL's and our image generation API.

title: Framac
blurb: An unofficial Framer for Web desktop app for Mac
description: A minimal, calm desktop companion app for the new Framer for Web.

title: 5-Minute RPG
blurb: A quick, pure React game in the browser
description: A Pokemon-esque browser experience made with React only. Enjoy "Best Game," an RPG filled with vengeance, growth and redemption. You can finish it in 5 minutes!

title: No-Bullshit Email Marketing Book
blurb: Grow your business with email marketing
description: **STOP DIGITAL MARKETING BULLSH*T!** There are literally thousands of "experts" out there ready to take your money and feed you with garbage information. We need to cut that bullsh*t right now. We are here to help you with that.

title: Envoy Protect
blurb: Re-open your workplace with confidence
description: As workplaces begin re-opening and employees start returning to work, health and safety will be more important than ever. Announcing Envoy Protect, a solution to help keep your team safe, manage employees entering your space, track capacity limits, and more.

title: Wondercall by Tico
blurb: Add video calls to any website and application in seconds
description: Get a complete video conferencing service on your website in 1 minute. No extra development and learning expense. No more switch between different windows and services. You can make it happen on your website with just a simple copy and paste.

title: Busy
blurb: Spend less time tracking time
description: Busy is a one-of-a-kind time tracking tool. It gives your business easy access to billable hours, holiday and absence planning in a calendar. Intuitively designed with automatic overtime, time off and leave calculation. Get more time for actual work with Busy!

title: COVID-19 Risk Assessment Chatbot
blurb: Create a safer workspace
description: COVID-19 Risk Assessment Chatbot is a free template that helps identify coronavirus symptoms. It provides advice on whether and where people should seek medical assistance. The chatbot’s content is based on WHO information and was verified by a medical team.

title: SuperFit
blurb: The easiest way to start a fitness membership.
description: SuperFit is a mobile app for iOS that helps fitness instructors create workout schedules that make money from subscriptions. Upload or design workouts on the go, and process recurring payments securely with Stripe.

title: Coment
blurb: Review, comment and approve all your documents in Slack
description: Coment is a free Slack App that will make your team save days on your feedback & approval processes. 💬Comment with your team, in one click ✅Review, approve or reject documents 📊Access directly who approved documents 🧑‍🚀No account needed 📱All platforms

title: How do I learn this?
blurb: Discover the best online resources to master any skill! 🚀
description: Need to learn a new skill but don't know where to start? Instantly find the best resources on the web for each step of your quest to mastery with PathBase's latest tool! Beyond courses, we recommend practice websites & industry tips - to ensure you succeed.

title: Omsom
blurb: Packaged starters to cook real deal Asian cuisine at home
description: Omsom brings proud, loud Asian flavors into your pantry, sitting right between the tomato sauce and olive oil. We craft starters (shortcuts for specific Asian dishes). All the sauces, seasonings, + aromatics needed - just add your own protein and veggies!

title: Sethealth
blurb: Medical toolkit for developers
description: Sethealth solves the hard problems of handling medical data, from parsing all kind of medical files, analyze them, anonymize, visualize, reconstruct in 3D, AR, traceability, encryption... We do the heavy lifting, so you can focus in building the best product.

title: Just Ask
blurb: Maximize your meetings with our free live Q&A tool
description: Just Ask is a free-to-use Q&A tool to help make remote meetings & events more productive. You can ask questions anonymously, upvote/downvote questions in real-time, and see all other questions from fellow participants. Go try it for yourself and your team!

title: Bard
blurb: A place for readers to discover content and support writers
description: Bard gives writers everything they need to create content and get paid for it. - Have all your writing in one place - Put exclusive content behind a paywall - Accept monthly subscriptions and one-time donations Get paid for the value you create.

title: CleverCookie
blurb: Learn to become money smart. It's free. Forever.
description: CleverCookie is a mobile game that teaches you how to manage your money. Compete with friends, race against the clock, and level up. It's fun and addictive. Our mission is to make financial freedom accessible to everyone.

title: Hidden Kittens
blurb: A fun Figma plugin to hide kittens in your designs 😸
description: Plugin for Figma "Hidden Kittens" will help give an emotional touch to your work. These Kittens are skilled at design and they will tell you what they think about your design decisions. You can replace the art-director in your team with these Kittens.

title: Tranzlate
blurb: Localization made easier.
description: Tranzlate helps with the localization of your app by removing the tedious process of manually updating, copying and pasting translation strings from Excel sheets.

title: Envision Glasses
blurb: AI-powered smartglasses for the blind and visually impaired
description: The Envision Glasses are a combination of the Google Glass 2 and Envision's award-winning AI-technology. The technology, currently available as an app on iOS and Android, already enables thousands of users to independently access the world around them.

title: Serverless Express
blurb: Easily host Express.js apps on AWS serverless infrastructure
description: Easily host and manage Express.js apps on cheap, auto-scaling, serverless infrastructure like AWS Lambda and AWS HTTP API via the Serverless Framework's new Serverless Express Component. Featuring custom domains, SSL certs, and costs ~$0.000003 per request!

title: Supermanagers Podcast
blurb: The podcast for managers who want to become great leaders 🦸
description: We interview leaders from all walks of life to tease out the habits, learnings, and experiences that have helped them be extraordinary at the fine craft of management. Listen to the first 3 episodes – featuring Drift, Twilio, and Clearbanc – today! ✨

title: Disney Face Masks
blurb: Reusable face masks ft. baby Yoda, Hulk & other characters
description: Disney is committed to serving the communities where we live and work. During these challenging times, Disney is using the power of their timeless stories and beloved characters to address their guests’ needs for family-friendly reusable cloth face masks.

title: StickyList
blurb: Your throwaway sticky note for your daily tasks. Digitized.
description: StickyList is just a sticky note for your next priorities. It isn’t feature rich, but it is powerful when used right. No Sync. No Reminders. No Repeat. Focus on your work, not our app. Only stored on your device. Drag & Drop for prioritising. And Dark Mode🌙

title: Portal
blurb: A tiny editor portal inside your browser
description: Portal is a Chrome extension that provides a real-time connection with your editor for faster CSS edits. Stay in your browser and instantly see what your CSS changes are doing. Select elements visually and Portal will find all the relevant CSS in your editor.

title: Tabsave
blurb: Quickly save your current tabs.
description: Whenever I close chrome I first go through and save hundreds of tabs to my notes. Made an extension that does that for me ^-^

title: QuickStart
blurb: Bookmark-based browser start page
description: QuickStart is a beautiful and clean new tab page for Chrome and Firefox. The extension gives you quick access to your bookmarks and allows you to organize them to your liking. QuickStart is completely free and open source!

title: NoCode Space
blurb: Find a job in No-Code startups
description: Help to build the future of software. +180 carefully curated job openings from the hottest tech space. Find your next great opportunity, get help landing the job, and level up your skills.

title: HBO Max
blurb: Where HBO meets so much more
description: Groundbreaking streaming bundle curates 100 years of iconic and beloved Warner Media programming, new original content, and fan-favorite acquired franchises & films. Sign up today for $14.99/month at HBOmax.com or via participating partners.

title: E-commerce Experts
blurb: Hire developers with strong e-commerce portfolios
description: Do you need more workpower to grow your e-commerce project? Book a temporary team from YouTeam’s curated directory of developers — browse by analyzing case studies of projects they worked on. All engineers are vetted by the YC-backed YouTeam.

title: Sidechat by Mixmax
blurb: Chat & collaborate on emails, without leaving your inbox.
description: A chat plugin for gmail that allows you to collaborate on specific emails. ❤️❤️

title: FunApéro
blurb: Video calls with games to have fun with friends & colleagues
description: Video calls with games for remote afterworks with colleagues or online parties with friends. FunApéro is 100% free, fully encrypted and doesn’t require any account. Be prepared for unexpected conversations, crunchy stories, and hours of laughs!

title: AdLibrary Helper
blurb: Free Facebook ad spy tool
description: AdLibrary Helper is a free Facebook ad spy tool. Its data comes from Facebook's official ad library. It can provide you an advertising list, which is more convenient and practical than the Facebook ad library.

title: Over Web βeta
blurb: The easy to use mobile design tool. Now in your Browser.
description: Welp! We were hoping to fly "under the radar" for a few more weeks but here goes. Over Web is in Public Beta! After 8 years as a mobile exclusive design app, we're building in the open and making everything in Over Web Free for everyone for 60 days. Try it!

title: Career Assist by Teal
blurb: Job searching doesn’t have to feel lonely anymore!
description: Career Assist is a group based & hands-on 6-week program to help jumpstart your job search. You'll take part in a series of live workshops and group discussions focused on job-searching. Free to the first 1000 applicants who have lost their job due to COVID19.

title: More
blurb: Meet people from the comfort of your quarantine
description: More is an iOS app for creating virtual, impromptu get-togethers with new people. Join curated activities or create your own, and other people have 30 minutes to join you. Just because we’re quarantined doesn’t mean we can’t do what inspires us, together.

title: Critq
blurb: Get honest, in-depth product feedback from investors
description: You've built something amazing and want to see what people think, we get it. Getting feedback from the right source is invaluable to maturing your product. Sign up now to demo your product to our network of VCs and angel investors.

title: Share Screen Recordings
blurb: One click screen recorder. No extensions needed.
description: One-click screen recorder that lets you share recordings instantly, directly in your browser. Simplify bug reporting, document business processes, understand open source issues faster or showcase your product. No software or extensions needed.

title: VSCode Cheatsheet
blurb: A cheatsheet to help you remember keybinds for VSCode
description: VS Code Cheatsheet is a Google Chrome extension especially designed for MacOS. Every time you open a new tab or reload the home page three shortcuts from three different categories are displayed.

title: Mornin
blurb: An anonymous audio conferencing service
description: Because the COVID-19, we made this web service in order to work from home safely and reliably. There is no need to install any app and no registration, we can smoothly communicate with our crews. BTW: it only work in Chrome/Firefox/Safari.

title: Trofi
blurb: A community group buying platform for local grocery delivery
description: Directly connecting farmers to consumers—cutting out the middleman to buy at true cost. The platform empowers the entire local supply chain by providing a group buy leader with the digital tools to purchase and distribute products to their community members!

title: BuildBubbles
blurb: Build Your Audience With Podcasts From WordPress Articles
description: Create compelling podcasts in minutes with our BuildBubbles templates, music, and voices. No microphone or expensive studio equipment required! Just your WordPress articles. Yet they sound awesome!

title: Employee Assessment Builder
blurb: Test & evaluate your employees online the not boring way
description: involve.me is a drag & drop builder for all your employee assessment needs. You can build online testing systems with training videos and automatically scored quizzes with instant feedback. involve.me assessments are intuitive to make and fun to take.

title: B21 Invest
blurb: Crypto investments simplified
description: At B21 our aim is to bring crypto investing for everyone. You can create your own cryptocurrency portfolio and invest using your bank account, credit card or debit card. Our mobile app is live in 65+ countries including USA.

title: Coderslang 2.0
blurb: Tech interview preparation - become a software engineer 🔥
description: Coderslang 2.0 helps you prepare for the Software Dev Interview by taking personalized quizzes with explanations. FREE on iOS and Android!

title: Wheel of Foreplay
blurb: We're here to help you stay home and bone.
description: Maintaining intimacy in relationships is tricky at the best of times—and right now it’s more important than ever. This is a light-hearted game to encourage people to have more sex while stuck at home, and ultimately to bring people together.

title: Splash for Roblox
blurb: Make music, get famous
description: Splash for Roblox lets you DJ in a virtual club performing live to adoring crowds. As you perform, you can earn fame and fortune based on the reaction of the crowd. The aim of the game is to have fun making music and become the most famous DJ on Roblox.

title: Password Diary
blurb: The password manager designed for older people.
description: Password Diary is a place to keep your passwords, for you, your partner, and your parents. We are making the simplest password management experience.

title: Envite
blurb: An integrated social chat for your e-commerce site
description: With the Envite plug-in every eCommerce site can enhance its customer experience with an integrated social chat that will get everyone connected while shopping! Host events with the video on! Socialize your eCommerce site by adding Envite new plug-in!

title: BazooApp
blurb: A personal success calendar based upon Chinese metaphysics
description: YOUR PERSONAL SUCCESS CALENDAR Bazoo App allows to determine the most and the least favorable periods of a user's life - up to a day and an hour. With the help of artificial intelligence, we have adapted ancient secret knowledge into convenient & modern app.

title: Zynq Workspace
blurb: Reopen your offices. Safely.
description: Zynq gets your employees back to the office safely.

title: PopNotes
blurb: The notes app that lives in the menu bar of your Mac
description: PopNotes is a macOS note-taking app that lives in the status bar of the Mac. It is instantly accessible so notes are always just a click away! It offers a collection of useful features that makes keeping and editing notes a fast and pleasant task!

title: MultiKey
blurb: The Highest-Grade Multitool Key with 19+ features🔧
description: MultiKey is an every day carry modern multi-tool featuring over 19+ tools in one. The MultiKey is available in three elemental material options. Brass 260, which is antimicrobial to help decrease the spreading of germs, Grade 5 Titanium, and Grade 2 Titanium.

title: COVID-19 Design Resources by Undesign
blurb: Access +400 COVID-19 free design resources
description: Fight COVID-19 using the best free design resources from the web

title: Virtual Wedding
blurb: Plan your virtual wedding with community, courses & products
description: Plan your virtual wedding ❤️with our free community, courses & products. Our community is for anyone - whether your wedding was cancelled/postponed due to CoVid-19, you just got engaged or you just want to learn more.

title: Flairtable
blurb: Frontend safe Airtable. Secure and scope your API key.
description: Using your Airtable API key in a frontend is a bad idea. With that key, anyone could wreak havoc on your bases. Flairtable scopes your Airtable API key. It allows you to safely link your Airtable bases with your frontend or client.

title: Slacker
blurb: Never show up as idle on Slack, Microsoft Teams, Skype, etc
description: Slacker moves your mouse pointer for you whenever you are idle - the result is that you always show as active on any corporate/office instant messaging tools (like Slack or Microsoft Teams) running on your work computer.

title: Loading.io
blurb: Discover and animate icons, images, backgrounds, and more
description: Loading.io is a way to discover design assets and bring them to life through animations. They offer icons and you can upload your own assets to use their animation tools.

title: Paintr
blurb: Painting with your smartphone.
description: Paintr is a collaborative digital canvas where your smartphone becomes your paintbrush.

title: Vatis Tech
blurb: Automated transcription and summary service of audio
description: Vatis Tech is a fast, accurate and insightful transcript and summary service. By offering an editable transcript, extracting a list of questions, mentioned entities and providing a short description based on most meaningful ideas, VatisTech saves countless hours when working with audio-video content.

title: Graspp
blurb: Point at text and translate it with your phone
description: Graspp lets you translate with your finger. The idea is simple: you just point at the word with your finger (yes, right in the book), point your phone camera and see the translation. THAT’S IT! Very simple and convenient.

title: TechTalks
blurb: A community of engineering, design, product and UX experts
description: TechTalks is a platform for communities where you can host in-person or vitual events, build a speaker profile and watch talk videos and slides. For organisers Techtalks has powerful tools to help you find speakers, manage costs and grow your community.
